SEARCH
Package projectone

Class Player

java.lang.Object
projectone.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a single player in the Uno game. Each player has a name, a hand of cards, and a strategy to choose cards during gameplay. Author: Andrew Nell Student ID: 110450836 Email ID: NELAY007 AI Tools Used: ChatGPT (documentation and formatting assistance) This is my own work as defined by the University's Academic Integrity Policy.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name, PlayerStrategy strategy)
      Constructs a new COMP2033_Project_1_110450836.Player with a name and strategy.
      Parameters:
      name - The player's name. Must not be null or blank.
      strategy - The strategy used by the player. Must not be null.

    • chooseCardToPlay

      public Card chooseCardToPlay(UnoGame gameController, List<Card> playableCards)
      Uses the strategy to choose a card to play from the list of valid options.
      Parameters:
      gameController - Game context to assist strategy decisions.
      playableCards - List of valid cards this turn.
      Returns:
      Chosen card or null if none selected.

    • chooseWildColor

      public Color chooseWildColor(UnoGame gameController)
      Uses the strategy to choose a color for a WILD card.
      Parameters:
      gameController - The game context.
      Returns:
      Chosen color.
